channel.title: Bug: Alpha rather than Stable Tor Browser Stable being installed by tb-updater
channel.description:
Normal that W-Workstation 9.6 downloads and installs the TBB alpha 4.5a?, rather than the current, regular TBB 4.03?
This is a fresh install, using the Whonix 'Update Tor Browser' (AnonDist) script/tool.
Edit by Patrick: Changed title.

item.title: Bug: Alpha rather than Stable Tor Browser Stable being installed by tb-updater
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Bug: Alpha rather than Stable Tor Browser Stable being installed by tb-updater

item.title: Bug: Alpha rather than Stable Tor Browser Stable being installed by tb-updater
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
No, it’s a bug.

The version file (https://www.torproject.org/projects/torbrowser/RecommendedTBBVersions) format was changed (https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/14739), and there is no stable version of it (https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/14383).

If you want to use the stable version, you have to use these instructions in meanwhile:

Whonix – 1 May 20

Tor Browser/Manual Download - Whonix

Manually Downloading Tor Browser. Useful in case Tor Browser Downloader (by Whonix ™ developers) is broken.

Read full topic
item.source: Bug: Alpha rather than Stable Tor Browser Stable being installed by tb-updater
